Text.Value: Where can I find this Blood?
Took new path... found monastery...  remembered...
Powerful relic... valuable... wanted to sell... start again...
Beneath... sun... it finds... its rest...
A rhyme... Blood of Lathander... hidden... guarded by monks...
*The corpse does not stir. It will answer no more questions.*
*The spell's power wanes. You can ask no more questions.*
*The corpse seems willing to speak - but not to its killer.*
What is the Blood of Lathander?
What did they want with you?

Synopsis: The tiefling scout who was observing the gith at the chokepoint. She will reveal details about the blood of lathander, a relic that the player can discover within the monastery.
